capsules_submitted.utterance:
You know, I've always been fascinated by the idea of a flying broom as a mode of transportation. I mean, can you imagine anything more thrilling than soaring through the air on a magical broomstick? It's like something straight out of a fantasy novel or a Harry Potter movie.

I think it's really cool that Harry has such an amazing ability to ride a flying broom with ease. I've tried riding one myself, but let's just say it didn't exactly go as planned! (laughs) Still, I can see why Harry would be so skilled at it - he's got the heart of a true wizard.

I'm not sure if I'd want to fly on a broomstick every day, though. I think I'd get a bit tired of the wind in my hair and the sun on my face! (smiling) But hey, for Harry, it's all part of being "The Boy Who Lived" - he's got to be ready for anything!
